titles: The subuersio[n] of Moris false foundacion where upon he sweteth to set faste and shove under his shameles shoris, to vnderproppe the popis churche: made by George Ioye.
author: Joye, George, d. 1553.
publisher: M.D.xxxiiii. at Emdon by Jacob Aurick [i.e. G. von der Haghen,
notes: Imprint from colophon; actual place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: More, Thomas, --  Sir, Saint 1478-1535 --  Early works to 1800.
